author: avetisya
body: This is the initial version of the trigger monitoring via JSON files. For now, all it does is print a pair of JSON files per process to the mon subdirectory of the base directory provided by the EvFDaqDirector service. The first file (the definition) has the names of all HLT paths and the second has the counts in each lumi section.
title: Moved JSON monitoring to HLTrigger/HLTanalyzers
